name: Proving Grounds
description:
• Team: East Galaxy Gaming
  • Projekttitel: Proving Grounds (https://proving-grounds.cf/)
  • Genre: Wave Shooter
  •  Perspective: FPS
  • Target audience: 16+
  • Gamemode: Singleplayer
  • Platforms: PC Controls: Mouse & Keyboard

Game Vision

Proving Grounds is a horde mode first-person shooter in a near-future science fiction setting. The player fights in an arena against several waves of enemies in order to achieve the highest possible score.

Experience

  • First person arena shooter
  • Science-Fiction setting
  • Horde mode with increasing difficulty per wave
